label: dimensions
comment: The physical dimensions of the product. Not every dimension is relevant to every products.  For example bulk materials may have wieght and volume but not length, with, or height."weight":{"value":10, "unit":"KGM"}

rangeIncludes.comment: Overall (length, width, height) dimensions and weight/volume of an item.

domainIncludes.comment: The ProductInformation class encapsulates detailed information regarding a specific product, including its identification details, manufacturer, and other pertinent details.
